text: The complementary DNA ( cDNA ) of the mouse <extra_id_0> Sharpin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene was cloned and amplified from RAW264.7 RNA extracts .
The primer sequences were forward , 5'-CC ATG GCG ATG TCG CCG CCC GCC GGC GGT ; reverse , 5' - AAG CTT CTA GGT GGA AGC TGC AGC AAG A .
The <extra_id_0> Sharpin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> cDNA was cloned into expression vector pFLAG-CMV-2 .
Murine fibroblasts and macrophages were were used to express recombinant <extra_id_0> SHARPIN <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein .
Cells ( 2x104 ) were seeded in 96-well treated plates the day before transfection .
After overnight incubation , 200 ng pFLAG - <extra_id_0> SHARPIN <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> plasmids were transfected with 0.5 ul Lipofectamine 2000 .
24 hours later , cells were incubated with fresh culture medium .
After another 24 hours , cells were lysed to confirm the FLAG - <extra_id_0> SHARPIN <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression by immunoblots with anti-FLAG .
Cells with no transfection and transfected with empty vector pFLAG-CMV-2 were used as negative control in all transfection experiments .
